alert.note: Alert for Denton; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 7:27AM CST until December 13 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL WISE AND NORTHWESTERN DENTON COUNTIES... At 726 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located 10 miles east of Decatur, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Bolivar and Slidell. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
